wikipedia_page.main: Charles Spencer Denman, 5th Baron Denman,  (7 July 1916 – 21 November 2012), was a British businessman. His interest in the Middle East, formed during the Second World War, was the focus for most of his business endeavours.

response: *Charles Spencer Denman, 5th Baron Denman, CBE, MC (1916–2012)
* Charles Spencer Denman, 5th Baron Denman, 2nd Baronet  (1916–2012), businessman and peer
